Both films feature themes of self-discovery and growth, and have a mix of humor and heartwarming moments. In "17 Again," Zac Efron plays a high school basketball player who wakes up one day to find himself back in his 17-year-old body, and the film follows his journey as he navigates this new phase of life. In "Hitch," Will Smith plays a professional "date doctor" who helps men improve their dating lives, but learns some unexpected lessons about love himself. I hope you enjoy these recommendations!
